GSD.product_version: versions from v4.16 to before v6.0.10
GSD.description:
serial: imx: Add missing .thaw_noirq hook

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.10 by commit e3f9d87d6f0732827c443bd1474df21c2fad704b, it was introduced in version v4.16 by commit 09df0b3464e528c6a4ca2c48d9ff6d2fd7cbd775. For more details please see the references link.
